messages.subject: Re: RPGs
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to all who gave me ideas for on-line RPGs that my dh and ds could try.  They are planning to try Runescape soon, but for now have all decided to work
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to all who gave me ideas for on-line RPGs that my dh and ds could
try. They are planning to try Runescape soon, but for now have all decided
to work together in RO. Ds John figured it was good to have people he knows
helping him along, so the three of them are now all playing it.

Brenda Rose

messages.subject: Re: RPGs
messages.msgSnippet: Pam, My son has a computer that my husband built with great video and memory cards.  We don t have any of the game systems. I wouldn t be against getting one.
messages.messageBody:
Pam,
My son has a computer that my husband built with great video and memory cards. We don't have any of the game systems. I wouldn't be against getting one. I just don't know much about them...and I haven't a clue which one would best suit his needs. Which system has the most RPG games?

Thanks for your help,
Deana
